title: Type ID: Sponsored by FontShop
content:
We’re happy to announce that the new Type ID board is sponsored by FontShop, a long-time supporter of Typophile.

Once you’ve identified that mystery font, we encourage you to go buy it at [FontShop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810003309/http:/www.fontshop.com/). With over 30,000 fonts and dozens of foundries to choose from, they’re bound to have just what you’re looking for.

 [‹ (x) Alzheimer's Association - TheMix {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810003309/http:/typophile.com/node/12922 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Happy (type)face - FF Rian's Dingbats {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810003309/http:/typophile.com/node/12942 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
I don’t know if you’ve all seen the (new?) TypeNavigator at FontShop, which is at  
 [http://typenav.fontshop.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810003309/http:/typenav.fontshop.com/ "http://typenav.fontshop.com/")

With that approach and the sponsorship of this forum, it would seem that FontShop have the Font ID thing comprehensively sorted...

Whaddyathink?
